resources.string:
The database is empty or there was an error with the local cache. 

If this is your first time running the app, it will need an internet connection to get the initial data off of the server and then to update future challenges as they come out. 

If this is not your first time, try reinstalling the application. Unfortunately you will lose your completions doing this, however. This is because we do not store or save any data for the app remotely.
